description: This file defines a sign-up page component in a Next.js application, implementing user registration with potentially creating an organization. It handles form input, validation, interaction with Supabase authentication, optional organization creation via API, and navigational logic post-signup.

methods.name: validate
methods.description: Validates the sign-up form data, ensuring required fields are filled and meet criteria.

methods.name: handleSignup
methods.description: Handles the form submission, performs sign-up with Supabase, creates an organization if specified, and navigates to the dashboard.
